Lyrics                    : [00:08.38]Like the words of a song, I hear you call / [00:16.14]Like a thief in my head, you criminal / [00:24.01]You stole my thoughts before I dreamed them / [00:31.82]And you killed my queen with just one pawn / [00:38.18]This goodbye is no surprise / [00:45.95]This goodbye won't make me cry / [00:52.54]Yeah, I'll keep on / [00:53.68]Dancin' until I'm dead / [00:55.62]Dancin' until I'm dead / [00:57.39]I'm dancin' until I'm dead / [01:00.34]Yeah, I'll keep on / [01:01.50]Dancin' until I'm dead (Dead) / [01:05.33]I'll dance until I'm dead / [01:08.60]Cuz when you killed me inside / [01:10.82]That's when I came alive / [01:12.81]Yeah, the music's gonna bring me back from death / [01:16.94]I'm dancin' until I'm dead (Dead) / [01:20.97]I'll dance until I'm dead / [01:26.41]You've created a creature of the night / [01:34.25]Now I'm haunting your air, your soul, your eyes / [01:40.59]This goodbye is no surprise (Is no surprise) / [01:48.40]This goodbye won't make me cry / [01:54.95]Yeah, I'll keep on / [01:56.11]Dancin' until I'm dead / [01:58.02]Dancin' until I'm dead / [01:59.84]I'm dancin' until I'm dead / [02:02.78]Yeah, I'll keep on / [02:03.92]Dancin' until I'm dead (Dead) / [02:07.80]I'll dance until I'm dead / [02:11.04]Cuz when you killed me inside / [02:13.28]That's when I came alive / [02:15.30]Yeah, the music's gonna bring me back from death / [02:19.35]I'm dancin' until I'm dead (Dead) / [02:23.40]I'll dance until I'm dead / [02:28.89]Do the dead dance! / [02:30.34]DEAD! / [02:32.04]The Dead Dance! / [02:36.69]Do The Dead Dance! / [02:38.19]DEAD! / [02:39.85]The Dead Dance! / [02:44.47]Do The Dead Dance! / [02:45.95]DEAD! / [02:47.67]The Dead Dance! / [02:52.31]Do The Dead Dance! / [02:53.78]DEAD! / [02:55.94]But I'm alive on the dance floor / [02:58.28]And I'm dancin' until I'm dead (Dead, I'm dancin' until I'm dead, I'm dancin' until I'm dead) / [03:05.23]Yeah, I'll keep on / [03:06.37]Dancin' until I'm dead (Dead) / [03:10.24]I'll dance until I'm dead / [03:13.48]Cuz when you killed me inside, that's when I came alive / [03:17.72]And the music's gonna bring me back from death / [03:21.90]I'm dancin' until I'm dead (Dead) / [03:25.94]Dance until I'm dead / [03:28.39]Dead
